tip1.title: Stranger Things 1
tip1.description: In Act 1, your main objective is to obtain the red key to open the door to the mysterious location. After regaining control over the main protagonist, go towards the ball. After a short cutscene, you are caught by the neighbor.

tip2.title: Stranger Things 2
tip2.description: Now, you find yourself opposite your neighbor's house. First, go inside your own house - it is right behind you. Pick up something to smash a window with (e.g. the TV set) and two cardboard boxes. Now, go towards the rack visible in the screenshot above.

tip3.title: Stranger Things 3
tip3.description: Stack two boxes (one on the top of) another - this will allow you to access the roof. Jump on the roof visible in the screenshot above. You have to sprint before the jump - watch out not to jump too far, though. Continue along the room and break the first window to the left. Use it to enter the room.
